Reviews.Title: NOT GREAT
Reviews.Author: beaderm0m
Reviews.Content: After a short time of use maybe 2 or 3 months it started shutting down, a few shots then the batteries were drained! It took great pictures but only 5 or 6??

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: S. K. "SK"
Reviews.Content: After buying a similar camera last year, we bought a second and were disappointed that it stopped working after only one week. It had to be returned for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Nancy
Reviews.Author: Nancy L. Punter
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new camera and it is working very well. Recieved it in a very timely manner. The camera is taking very nice pictures and easy to work.
